data.event: The town was first settled around 1791.

event.title: was formed from the Town of Lyons in 1825

data.event: The Town of Arcadia was formed from the Town of Lyons in 1825.
An asylum for the mentally retarded was established in Arcadia in 1789.

event.title: 1957, the Bergen Swamp Preservation Society acquired

data.event: In 1957, the Bergen Swamp Preservation Society acquired Zurich Bog for conservation.
